item.title: About
item.description: Contact To contact me E-mail info@tc2.dev LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/jos-polfliet/ Twitter https://twitter.com/JosPolfliet Topics I like Machine Learning with a special interest in Natural Language Processing Sustainability. I am striving to living carbon neutral in 2020 and beyond. I accomplish that by trying to reducing my carbon footprint by mostly eating plant-based food and living close to work (10 min bike ride). The inevitable carbon I do produce, I offset. Reading.
